name: Tough: Dark Fight
synopsis: Based on the popular "Tough" comic, featured in Young Jump magazine. Tough: Dark Fight features an original story which takes place in the two years between the original "Koukou Tekken-den Tough" comic (published between 1993 and 2003) and the later "Tough" reprisal series. Fans of the series will be able to experience the happenings of those two missing years. The game features a number of characters, including eight who haven't been featured in the comic.
